scripts.postinstall: cd backend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run start"
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.heroku:local: npm run heroku:env && npm install && npm run heroku-postbuild && REPOSITORY_IMPLEMENTATION=postgres PORT=9000 heroku local
scripts.preview: docker build -t pickflix:preview . && echo 'Image built successfully! Run with: npm run preview:run' && docker run -p 8004:80 --env-file .env pickflix:preview

name: pickflix
description: An app that helps you pick flixs üçø to watch. The frontend is a React/Redux app and the backend is an Express REST API.
